actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on certain woven fabrics of synthetic staple fibers, containing 85 percent or more by weight of polyester staple fibers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on certain woven fabrics of synthetic staple fibers, containing 85 percent or more by weight of polyester staple fibers.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on certain woven fabrics of synthetic staple fibers, containing 85 percent or more by weight of polyester staple fibers.
